works.title: BabyLens
works.description: BabyLens is an AI-powered mobile app that generates realistic baby photos using photos of two parents. I developed both the frontend and backend of the app, integrating image processing, subscription logic, and a smooth user experience.

works.title: makromusic for Artists
works.description: makromusic for Artists is a platform where artists can create their own profiles and share their music with the makromusic mobile app.

works.title: Markview
works.description: Markview is a tool that enables users to quickly and easily create Markdown files and instantly preview their content in a stylish format. It is ideal for enhancing your project's documentation or creating README files with ease.

works.title: PsikologOfisi
works.description: I built the Psikologofisi project completely from scratch. I took on tasks such as pixel-perfect coding of existing designs and making RestAPI connections. In this project, I prioritized user experience and paid attention to details.
